summary: A groundbreaking investigation into the secretive world of private security forces in Iraq.
cast: Alan Bell|Phil Lancaster|Madelaine Drohan|Robert Young Pelton|Peter Singer|Doug Brooks|Stephen J. Cannell|Cobus Claassens|Slavko Ilic|Neall Ellis|Frances Stonor Saunders|John F. Mullins|Eike Kluge|Tasha Bradsell|James Ashcroft|Rob McKintyre|Gerard Butler|Sheldon Maxwell|Tim Spicer|Mark Thatcher
title: Shadow Company
